title: Deputies: Person shot, killed in Iredell County
content:
BELMONT, NC (WBTV) -
A person was shot and killed in Iredell County Monday evening, according to deputies.
The incident happened just after 9:30 p.m. on Treeline Drive, off of Bethesda Road in Statesville. Police have not released many details, but confirmed the victim was killed.
Investigators have not said what may have led to the shooting of if anyone was taken into custody.
No names have been released.
